nodes.text: Calder Nettic's wife lived with him on the pastoral Outer Rim planet of Dantooine during the time of the Jedi Civil War. In 3956 BBY, Nettic cheated on her, sleeping with the wife of another colonist named Handon Guld. Nettic also cheated a man named Rickard Lusoff out of credits in business deal. The two individually plotted to kill Calder, although Guld was the one to actually commit the murder. During the investigation, Lusoff claimed that he should be the one to break the news to Nettic's wife.
Calder Nettic's wife was mentioned in the 2003 roleplaying game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.
